title: Annual Sports Day
description: Celebrate our annual sports day with exciting events and competitions.

title: Art & Craft Exhibition
description: Explore creative artworks and craft projects by our talented students.

title: School Band Concert
description: Enjoy a night of live music performances by our school band.

title: Cultural Dance Night
description: Experience vibrant dance performances celebrating cultural diversity.

title: School Play: The Journey
description: Watch an engaging play performed by our school drama club.

title: Science Fair
description: Discover innovative science projects and experiments at our annual fair.

title: Book Reading & Poetry
description: Join us for an evening of inspiring literature and poetry readings.

title: Robotics Workshop
description: Participate in a hands-on robotics workshop and learn the basics of coding.

title: Community Service Day
description: Engage in community service projects and make a positive impact.

title: International Food Festival
description: Taste and enjoy cuisines from around the world at our food festival.
